com.radirius.mercury.graphics.particles

Class ParticleSystem.ParticleSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.particles.ParticleSystem.ParticleSetup
  • Enclosing class:
    ParticleSystem

    public static class ParticleSystem.ParticleSetup
extends Object
    A setup for particle systems.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float acceleration
      The value by which the velocity of a particle will be multiplied each frame.
      Color color
      The color of the particles.
      Vector2f gravity
      The value that adds to the x and y of each particle each frame.
      float growth
      The value by which the size of the particles will be multiplied each frame.
      int lifeinframes
      The amount of frames that will pass a single particle before death/removal.
      float rotation
      The amount that each particle will rotate each frame.
      float size
      The size of the particles.
      float speed
      The speed by which the particle will be launched out of the emitter.
      Texture texture
      The texture of each particle.
      Vector2f validangle
      The 2 valid angles in between which any particle can go through.
